sourcesContent:
import { Component, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.css'] }) export class FooterComponent { showBackToTop = false; @HostListener('window:scroll', []) onWindowScroll() { // Show back to top button when scrolled down this.showBackToTop = window.scrollY > 300; } scrollToTop() { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' }); } }
